meanings.definition: A surgical procedure to remove excess skin and fat from the eyelids.
meanings.sent1: The blepharoplast helped improve the appearance of her eyelids.
meanings.sent2: After the blepharoplast, her eyelids looked more youthful.
meanings.sent3: The blepharoplast made her eyelids feel lighter than a feather!
meanings.sent4: Her eyelids felt like a burden until the blepharoplast lifted it away.
meanings.sent5: The blepharoplast transformed her eyelids into a fresh canvas.

meanings.definition: The surgical repair or reconstruction of the eyelids.
meanings.sent1: He underwent a blepharoplast to fix his droopy eyelids.
meanings.sent2: The blepharoplast successfully restored his eyelids' function.
meanings.sent3: The blepharoplast turned his eyelids into a work of art!
meanings.sent4: After the blepharoplast, his eyelids felt brand new.
meanings.sent5: The blepharoplast was like a magic touch for his eyelids.
